snippet: With more fungal meningitis cases reported, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said it was important for people who had injections for back pain to come forward.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention officials emphasize that it is absolutely essential to find everyone who may have been exposed to the tainted steroid made by New England Compounding Center, which has been linked to multistate meningitis outbreak.
lead_paragraph: With more fungal meningitis cases reported, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said it was important for people who had injections for back pain to come forward.

headline.seo: Officials Seek Patients Exposed to Tainted Back-Pain Drug
headline.main: Officials Seek People Exposed to a Tainted Drug
headline.print_headline: Officials Seek People Exposed to a Tainted Drug

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
